title: 094 - It Takes All Of Us
description: On today's show, in an abundance of caution, both Tony and Nick do the show from their respective houses as they needed to get Covid tested before returning to the studio, so the boys jump right into a deep Pod FOD and discuss some of the other bad Halloween candies, whether or not water on the moon means life is sustainable there, Mitt being able to squeeze an extra 2 gallons of gas into his car, the new Assassin's Creed series coming to Netflix, which animal would be the most dangerous with the intelligence of a human, which President they'd like to have on their side in a fight to the death, they take a peek at a few videos that have been making the rounds on the internet, and Digs and Nick's pups both make an appearance! Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch full episodes and everything else from PMI, and keep submitting your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to get your submission into the Pod FOD. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you Friday. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
